sites.name: Špilberk Castle
sites.description: Historic fortress and former prison, now a museum complex offering panoramic views over Brno. The castle has served as a royal castle, baroque fortress, and prison throughout its 800-year history.
sites.seasonal_notes: Beautiful views year-round; castle grounds accessible in winter. Summer concerts and events.
sites.booking_tips: Buy tickets online for skip-the-line access. Combined tickets available for multiple exhibitions.

sites.name: Villa Tugendhat
sites.description: UNESCO World Heritage modernist villa designed by Ludwig Mies van der Rohe. An architectural masterpiece of functionalist design from 1930, showcasing revolutionary interior design concepts.
sites.seasonal_notes: Indoor attraction, perfect for any weather. Garden tours available in warmer months.
sites.booking_tips: Advance booking essential - limited daily visitors. Book weeks ahead, especially for weekend visits.

sites.name: Cathedral of St. Peter and Paul
sites.description: Iconic twin-spired Gothic cathedral dominating Brno's skyline from Petrov Hill. The cathedral features beautiful neo-Gothic architecture and offers stunning city views from its towers.
sites.seasonal_notes: Accessible year-round; tower climbs offer spectacular views. Christmas masses are particularly atmospheric.
sites.booking_tips: Free entry to cathedral; small fee for tower access. Check service times before visiting.

sites.name: Zelný trh (Cabbage Market)
sites.description: Historic market square in the heart of Brno, home to the unique Parnas Fountain and surrounded by beautiful baroque and renaissance buildings. Daily fresh produce market since medieval times.
sites.seasonal_notes: Year-round market; Christmas markets in December. Best atmosphere in morning when market is most active.
sites.booking_tips: No booking required. Visit early morning for freshest produce and liveliest atmosphere.

sites.name: Moravian Museum
sites.description: Largest museum in Moravia featuring extensive collections of natural history, archaeology, and ethnography. Houses the famous Venus of Dolní Věstonice, the oldest known ceramic sculpture.
sites.seasonal_notes: Indoor attraction perfect for rainy days. Special exhibitions change seasonally.
sites.booking_tips: Regular tickets available at entrance. Student discounts available. Check for special exhibition pricing.

sites.name: Technical Museum
sites.description: Fascinating museum showcasing Czech industrial heritage with vintage cars, motorcycles, aircraft, and machinery. Interactive exhibits make it perfect for families and technology enthusiasts.
sites.seasonal_notes: Great indoor activity for any weather. Special events and demonstrations on weekends.
sites.booking_tips: Family tickets available. Check website for special events and guided tours in English.
